user_query: I have something to show you Wade what are we doing here [Music] Gale what's going on do you still want to see a vivisteria I'm supposed to get in there at least 20 minutes why does anyone get to tell you what you can do in your life a vivisteria [Music] I'm so sorry I should never are you kidding I finally said it was inspiring let's see what happens I could vaporize you you know foreign [Music] I have to go where are you going I take over tomorrow you don't want that you said so yourself but getting to do what you want is a luxury and not for people like me don't you dare judge me I'm fire Wade I can't be anything more than that I cannot throw all of that away just for you [Music] this is Lantern I bring from Old Country I thought of other Reese's what are you doing here there are a million reasons why this can't work Mario take the chance I love you Amber Lumen Bernie it's love Wade to go put go foreign yes [Music] [Applause] [Music] I'm good at 4 30. the Flames I was hoping to make a more heroic entrance hold the door [Music] remember Ember we have to go no this is my father's whole life tell me that Lantern thank you too hot in here I don't know what to do it's okay no it's not okay I have no regrets you gave me something people search for their whole life [Music] foreign saved me this is all my fault I'm sorry the dream [Music] I loved him dad it never did I wanna have you with me in my life forever I knew it my nose always knows can't believe I was gonna shut this

entities.entity_description: Elemental은 불과 물 등 원소 캐릭터들이 등장하는 애니메이션 영화이다
Ember는 불의 원소 캐릭터로, 자신이 불이기 때문에 사랑할 수 없다고 생각하지만 결국 사랑을 찾게 되는 주인공이다
Wade는 물의 원소 캐릭터로, Ember를 사랑하며 그녀에게 위스테리아를 보여주고 용기를 주는 인물이다
Gale은 영화에 등장하는 캐릭터로, Ember와 Wade의 이야기에 관련된 인물이다
Bernie는 Ember의 아버지로, 가게를 운영하며 딸의 행복을 바라는 인물이다

relationships.relationship_description: Wade는 Ember를 사랑하며 그녀에게 위스테리아를 보여주고 함께하고 싶어한다
Ember는 처음에는 불과 물의 관계가 불가능하다고 생각했지만 결국 Wade를 사랑하게 된다
Bernie는 Ember의 아버지로, 딸의 사랑을 결국 인정하게 된다
